Pre-Game Insights: Experts favor Mexico to win based on their seeded position in Group B.
Ecuador is expected to give strong resistance to Mexico, considered favorites.
Venezuela is considered one of the weakest-performing teams and the only nation from CONMEBOL that has never qualified for a World Cup.
Jamaica qualified directly after shocking Canada in the CONCACAF Nations League.
Others: Mexico needs to find a long-term solution for who should lead the team after parting ways with coach Tata Martino.
Ecuador will be led by Spanish manager Felix Sanchez.
Venezuela has been undefeated since the first round of World Cup qualifiers.
Jamaica has one of its most talented teams in years, with numerous players in the English Premier League at the peak of their powers.
